thread.title: Dishonest and false advertising
thread.title_full: Dishonest and false advertising - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: richardmS2590LK
title: Dishonest and false advertising
text:
Be warned don't be fooled by any of the photos this hotel puts on either their website or their honours app.
Booked the executive king room and was given a room that looked nothing like the pictures but looked exactly like the double room?
The room map proved my point that they had actually given me this room but they still insisted this wasn't the case. Even with the evidence they still didn't want to admit the problem....basically they over booked and thought " they'll never know"
Complimentary breakfast consisted of egg and the world's slowest toaster for vegetarians.
Honestly for the price paid and standard of this hotel premier Inn would be an upgrade.
